00073 {

00075     std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt> opts = getDefaultDocOptions();
00076     CNAnalysisMethodAllelicDifference* pMethod = new CNAnalysisMethodAllelicDifference();
00077     std::string strPrefix = getPrefix();
00078 
00079     pMethod->m_dAllelicDifferenceOutlierTrim = setupDoubleParameter("outlier-trim", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);

00095 /**
00096  * @brief Run the analysis.
00097  */
00098 void CNAnalysisMethodAllelicDifference::run()
00099 {
00100     Verbose::out(1, "CNAnalysisMethodAllelicDifference::run(...) start");
00101     isSetup();
00102         if (!m_pEngine->getOptBool("cyto2")) {determineLocalProbeSets();}
00103 //    Verbose::progressBegin(1, "CNAnalysisMethodAllelicDifference::run(...) ", 1, 1, 1);
00104 //    Verbose::progressStep(1);
00105     calculateAllelicDifferences();
00106 //    Verbose::progressEnd(1, "Done");
00107     Verbose::out(1, "CNAnalysisMethodAllelicDifference::run(...) end");
00108 }

00110 /**
00111  * Calcuate the Allelic Differences.
00112  * The data is processed by experiment meaning the all the probe set data is processed for a given experiment.
00113  * @param int - The col index.
00114  * @param int - The experiment index.
00115  */
00116 void CNAnalysisMethodAllelicDifference::calculateAllelicDifferences()
00117 {
00118 //    Verbose::out(3, "CNAllelicDifferenceData::calculateAllelicDifferences");
00119     AffxMultiDimensionalArray<float>& vAAMedianSignal = getV1();
00120     AffxMultiDimensionalArray<float>& vABMedianSignal = getV2();
00121     AffxMultiDimensionalArray<float>& vBBMedianSignal = getV3();
00122     AffxMultiDimensionalArray<float>& vAAMinusABMedianSignal = getV4();
00123     AffxMultiDimensionalArray<float>& vBBMinusABMedianSignal = getV5();
00124     int iAAandABCount = 0;
00125     int iBBandABCount = 0;
00126     double NaN = numeric_limits<double>::quiet_NaN();
00127     for (int iRowIndex = 0; (iRowIndex < CNAnalysisMethod::getProbeSets()->getCount()); iRowIndex++)
00128     {
00129         CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = CNAnalysisMethod::getProbeSets()->getAt(iRowIndex);
00130         vAAMedianSignal.set(iRowIndex, pobjProbeSet->getAAMedianSignal());
00131         vABMedianSignal.set(iRowIndex, pobjProbeSet->getABMedianSignal());
00132         vBBMedianSignal.set(iRowIndex, pobjProbeSet->getBBMedianSignal());
00133         // Not AA, but AB and BB, so we need to set the AA value.
00134         if ((isNaN(vAAMedianSignal.get(iRowIndex))) && (!isNaN(vABMedianSignal.get(iRowIndex))) && (!isNaN(vBBMedianSignal.get(iRowIndex))))
00135         {
00136             vAAMedianSignal.set(iRowIndex, (vABMedianSignal.get(iRowIndex) - vBBMedianSignal.get(iRowIndex)));
00137         }
00138         // Not BB, but AA and AB, so we need to set the BB value.
00139         if ((isNaN(vBBMedianSignal.get(iRowIndex))) && (!isNaN(vABMedianSignal.get(iRowIndex))) && (!isNaN(vAAMedianSignal.get(iRowIndex))))
00140         {
00141             vBBMedianSignal.set(iRowIndex, (vABMedianSignal.get(iRowIndex) - vAAMedianSignal.get(iRowIndex)));
00142         }
00143         // Not AB, but AA and BB, so we need to set the AB value.
00144         if ((isNaN(vABMedianSignal.get(iRowIndex))) && (!isNaN(vAAMedianSignal.get(iRowIndex))) && (!isNaN(vBBMedianSignal.get(iRowIndex))))
00145         {
00146             vABMedianSignal.set(iRowIndex, (float)(0.5 * (vAAMedianSignal.get(iRowIndex) + vBBMedianSignal.get(iRowIndex))));
00147         }
00148         // Not AA and not AB, but BB, so we need to set the AA value and the AB value.
00149         if ((isNaN(vAAMedianSignal.get(iRowIndex))) && (isNaN(vABMedianSignal.get(iRowIndex))) && (!isNaN(vBBMedianSignal.get(iRowIndex))))
00150         {
00151             vABMedianSignal.set(iRowIndex, 0);
00152             vAAMedianSignal.set(iRowIndex, -vBBMedianSignal.get(iRowIndex));
00153         }
00154         // Not BB and not AB, but AA, so we need to set the AB and BB values.
00155         if ((isNaN(vBBMedianSignal.get(iRowIndex))) && (isNaN(vABMedianSignal.get(iRowIndex))) && (!isNaN(vAAMedianSignal.get(iRowIndex))))
00156         {
00157             vABMedianSignal.set(iRowIndex, 0);
00158             vBBMedianSignal.set(iRowIndex, -vAAMedianSignal.get(iRowIndex));
00159         }
00160         //AA and AB. Get the AA - AB median signals so we can calculate the median of them.
00161         if ((!isNaN(vAAMedianSignal.get(iRowIndex))) && (!isNaN(vABMedianSignal.get(iRowIndex))))
00162         {
00163             vAAMinusABMedianSignal.set(iAAandABCount, (vAAMedianSignal.get(iRowIndex) - vABMedianSignal.get(iRowIndex)));
00164             iAAandABCount++;
00165         }
00166         // BB and AB. Get the BB - AB median signals so we can calculate the median of them.
00167         if ((!isNaN(vBBMedianSignal.get(iRowIndex))) && (!isNaN(vABMedianSignal.get(iRowIndex))))
00168         {
00169             vBBMinusABMedianSignal.set(iBBandABCount, (vBBMedianSignal.get(iRowIndex) - vABMedianSignal.get(iRowIndex)));
00170             iBBandABCount++;
00171         }
00172     }
00173     // Calculate the median of the median singal, and use this to fill in where we have AB but not AA and BB.
00174     double dAAMinusABMedian = vAAMinusABMedianSignal.median(iAAandABCount);
00175     double dBBMinusABMedian = vBBMinusABMedianSignal.median(iBBandABCount);
00176     for (int iRowIndex = 0; (iRowIndex < CNAnalysisMethod::getProbeSets()->getCount()); iRowIndex++)
00177     {
00178         float thisABMedianSignal = vABMedianSignal.get(iRowIndex);
00179         if ((isNaN(vAAMedianSignal.get(iRowIndex))) && (isNaN(vBBMedianSignal.get(iRowIndex))) && (!isNaN(thisABMedianSignal)))
00180         {
00181             vAAMedianSignal.set(iRowIndex, (float)(dAAMinusABMedian + thisABMedianSignal));
00182             vBBMedianSignal.set(iRowIndex, (float)(dBBMinusABMedian + thisABMedianSignal));
00183         }
00184     }
00185     // For each experiment calculate the allelic differences using the AA, AB, and BB median signal values.
00186     for (int iRowIndex = 0; (iRowIndex < CNAnalysisMethod::getProbeSets()->getCount()); iRowIndex++)
00187     {
00188         CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = CNAnalysisMethod::getProbeSets()->getAt(iRowIndex);
00189         pobjProbeSet->setAllelicDifference((float)NaN);
00190         if ((!isNaN(vAAMedianSignal.get(iRowIndex))) && (!isNaN(vABMedianSignal.get(iRowIndex))) && (!isNaN(vBBMedianSignal.get(iRowIndex))))
00191         {
00192             double dDifference = (pobjProbeSet->getAAlleleSignal() - pobjProbeSet->getBAlleleSignal());
00193             if (!Util::isFinite(dDifference)) {dDifference = 0.0;}
00194             float fGcAdjustment = pobjProbeSet->getGcAdjustment();
00195             if (fGcAdjustment != 0)
00196             {
00197                 dDifference *= pow(2.0, -((double)fGcAdjustment));
00198                 float fMedianAutosomeMedian = getExperiment()->getMedianAutosomeMedian();
00199                 if (fMedianAutosomeMedian != 0)
00200                 {
00201                     dDifference *= pow(2.0, -((double)fMedianAutosomeMedian));
00202                 }
00203             }
00204             double dAMinusB = 0;
00205             if (dDifference < vABMedianSignal.get(iRowIndex))
00206             {
00207                 dAMinusB = -(dDifference - vABMedianSignal.get(iRowIndex)) / (vBBMedianSignal.get(iRowIndex) - vABMedianSignal.get(iRowIndex));
00208             }
00209             else
00210             {
00211                 dAMinusB = (dDifference - vABMedianSignal.get(iRowIndex)) / (vAAMedianSignal.get(iRowIndex) - vABMedianSignal.get(iRowIndex));
00212             }
00213             ADOutlierTrim(dAMinusB);
00214             pobjProbeSet->setAllelicDifference((float)dAMinusB);
00215         }
00216     }
00217 }
00218 
00219 void CNAnalysisMethodAllelicDifference::ADOutlierTrim(double& ad)
00220 {
00221     if (fabs(ad) > m_dAllelicDifferenceOutlierTrim) {
00222         ad = numeric_limits<double>::quiet_NaN();
00223     }
00224 }
00225 
00226 void CNAnalysisMethodAllelicDifference::determineLocalProbeSets()
00227 {
00228     if(m_bLocalProbeSetsDetermined)
00229     {
00230         return;
00231     }
00232     const bool isCyto2 = m_pEngine->getOptBool("cyto2");
00233     int iNumberOfProbeSets = CNAnalysisMethod::getProbeSets()->getCount();
00234     for (int iIndex = 0; iIndex<iNumberOfProbeSets; iIndex++)
00235     {
00236         CNProbeSet* p = CNAnalysisMethod::getProbeSets()->getAt(iIndex);
00237         if (isCyto2 && !p->getValidSCARExists())
00238         {
00239             continue;
00240         }
00241                 if (isCyto2)
00242                 {
00243                         if(p->processAsSNP() && !isNaN(p->getAllelicDifference()))
00244                         {
00245                                 getProbeSets()->add(p);
00246                         }
00247                 }
00248                 else
00249                 {
00250                         if(p->processAsVisualization() && !isNaN(p->getAllelicDifference()))
00251                         {
00252                                 getProbeSets()->add(p);
00253                         }
00254                 }
00255     }
00256     m_bLocalProbeSetsDetermined = true;
00257 }

00259 void CNAnalysisMethodAllelicDifference::filterCutOff(
00260                                                 CNProbeSetArray* probeSets,
00261                                                 int chrStart,
00262                                                 int chrEnd,
00263                                                 float cutoff3,
00264                                                 float cutoff4,
00265                                                 vector<bool>& filteredProbeSets
00266                                                 )
00267 {
00268     // No filtering
00269     for (int i = chrStart; i <= chrEnd; i++) {
00270         filteredProbeSets[i] = true;
00271     }
00272 }
